effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

short_effect.sun_moon: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Has an increased chance for a critical hit and a 10% chance to poison the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user hits the target with its tail. This may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user hits the target with its tail. This may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user hits the target with its tail. This may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.
